content: l60370 three squares are made then crocheted together to make the ruana size finished length from back neck to lower point 34 / 86 5 cm finished width at widest = 68 / 172 5 cm lion brand shawl in a ball 481yrds/440m 5oz/150g 203 mindful mauve 3 balls crochet hook size h-8 gauge 1 square = 22½ x 22½ / 57 cm x 57 cm 15 double_crochet x 8 row = 4 / 10cm special stitch - rev single_crochet reverse single_crochet
